Author: MihailJ
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi Tutorial | Under what circumstances will the event be invalid? https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/bodhi-tutorial-under-what-circumstances-will-the-event-be-invalid-76dd90020e2a  Why the event I created is invalid?  Why did the result come out and the incident was invalidated?  why? ….  Bodhi Prediction Market is the world’s first decentralized prediction market that launched on a blockchain’s main network. With the full deployment of the forecasting application, users have downloaded, installed, and used it. Sometimes, the user may be convinced that an event is “invalid.” Because once the event was set into invalid, all tokens can only be returned in the same way, which is really a pity. So what kind of situation will cause the event to be invalid? How is it distinguished whether the event is effective? Let us discuss this topic together today.  Invalid event cause 1: There is a flaw when creating the event Invalid event cause 2: Event subject becomes unpredictable Invalid event cause 3: Event still in the betting phase when the event has concluded

Author: Artemsv
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi partners with Ethos wallet    We are excited to announce a strategic partnership with Ethos, an intuitive universal wallet and fiat gateway that makes buying, trading, and managing crypto assets simple. Ethos is aligned with Bodhi on our mission to leverage the wisdom of the crowds, and provides rich community consensus features, ratings, and reviews. These features let users share valuable insights while maintaining complete control over their assets.  “We are pleased to have Bodhi join the Ethos Airdrop Program. We believe that partnerships like these with projects that share Ethos’s values further our mission to make blockchain technology more accessible to everyone,” Ethos founder Shingo Lavine said.  Bodhi Founder Xiahong Lin said: “Bodhi is proud to partner with Ethos, a preeminent, people-powered cryptocurrency wallet. With the BOT token now storable on Ethos, we can make Bodhi accessible to a wider audience, allowing more investors and enthusiasts to tap into the predictions created on our open and fair market.”  You can Pre-Register for Ethos Universal Wallet and you’ll be eligible to have some BOT tokens airdropped to the new wallet once you create it! It’s expected at end of May, stay tuned for the exact launch date!  https://medium.com/bodhi-prediction-market/bodhi-partners-with-ethos-wallet-1ef14e4a709f

Author: Makleyhill
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi Mainnet Launch Announcement Recap with Qtum  This past Friday, on April 13th, 2018, Bodhi announced its plans to launch a working Decentralized Application (DApp) on the Qtum Mainnet on April 23, 2018. Bodhi was the first DApp to launch on the Qtum Testnet at the end of 2017, and is continuing its commitment to be the leading DApp in the Qtum ecosystem in terms of progress.  The meetup began with a talk by Qtum’s Founder, Patrick Dai, speaking about the philosophy of Qtum, its advantages and challenges, as well as a look to the future, and Qtum’s upcoming x86, which will allow coders to program in whatever programming languages they are already comfortable with, lowering the barrier to entry for wider developer adoption of blockchain technologies.  Following this was a talk by Bodhi’s Founder, Xiahong Lin, giving an overview of prediction markets, and their natural fit with blockchain technologies. He next spoke about the competitive landscape of blockchain prediction markets, with a comparison to well known alternatives. Bodhi then unveiled their demo, and Xiahong walked us through the use cases.  https://medium.com/bodhi-prediction-market/bodhi-mainnet-launch-announcement-recap-with-qtum-745311ef8847

Author: Artemsv
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi announces two additional exchanges supporting the BOE Ethereum token airdrop  Hello, we are back from Consensus New York, we met many interesting people and projects, including our panel with other prediction market projects (we’ll go into on a separate update later).  The Bodhi Foundation will issue a new token, BOE (Bodhi On Ethereum), based on the Ethereum ERC20 token model standard. The BOE will have the same 100 million total supply as the Bodhi Token, BOT. More information can be found on the original announcement.  We are happy to announce two additional exchanges that will support the BOE airdrop, bringing the total number of participating exchanges to seven. These include the following:  *Gate.io *Bibox *Allcoin *LBank *BigOne *Cobinhood (new!) *Shangya Exchange (new!)  To receive the BOE airdrop, users must hold BOT on the above mentioned exchanges before May 31st, 23:59:59 GMT+8.  Notice: BOT not held on participating exchanges are unable to receive BOE. On June 1st, 23:59 GMT+8, exchanges will credit BOT users with BOE at a 1-to-1 ratio. After the Bodhi Foundation and exchanges finish the token distribution, BOE will be listed for trading at a future date. https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/bodhi-announces-two-additional-exchanges-supporting-the-boe-ethereum-token-airdrop-ae2dbdf9f4a4

During the events, we are exploring decentralized applications on the Qtum blockchain, including prediction markets, autonomous energy, creative content exchange, and crypto wallet as applied in different sectors while also providing industry networking opportunities.

Author: DeViL303
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi Development Update 7.15.2018  Hi everyone! Bodhi here today to give you a long-withstanding development and roadmap update.  Let’s start with the roadmap update to give you all a clear picture of what’s upcoming.  Roadmap Update Q3 2018: First iteration of dapp light client for Qtum finished and integrated with Qrypto light wallet.  Q4 2018: Polishing of existing contract logic and dapp UI/UX. Deployment of Bodhi Ethereum dapp contracts done. Start integration of BOE into light client.  Q1 2019: Finish integration of BOE light client into dapp to have multi-token platform.  These are the outlined portions of things to come within the next few quarters here at Bodhi. As often experienced with many crypto projects, the roadmaps generally do tend to overpromise or overstate their abilities to get things done on time. So… with that in mind, we would like to take a more realistic and humble approach and give periodic updates to our roadmap as things progress and take shape. We feel this will lead to more accurate estimations and the fact that we don’t want to let you all down by overestimating ourselves. https://medium.com/bodhi-prediction-market/bodhi-development-update-7-15-2018-81c364e59aef

Author: alexvilis
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi Airdrop for QTUM holders  Hi, we are planning to airdrop BOT Tokens to QTUM holders to encourage users to try out the Bodhi Prediction Market Platform before we launched on the Qtum Mainnet.  We will airdrop 4,000,000 BOT to QTUM holders during Chinese New Year on Feb 16th.  Every One-Hundred (100) QTUM will receive Four (4) BOT tokens. Only wallet addresses that contain more than 10 QTUM will receive the airdrop.  Here are the details:  We will take a snapshot of the Qtum blockchain on Block 93333 (expected to be between February 1 and February 5) for the Airdrop. Users MUST complete depositing QTUM tokens into their wallets (e.g., Qbao, Qtum Core Wallet) before Block 93333 to be eligible to receive the airdrop.  We recommend users collect their QTUM tokens in a single wallet address before Block 93330 to leave time to verify that the balance can be properly queried using the Qtum Explorer. To ensure accuracy, we also recommend holding the QTUM in your wallet through Block 93335. Users may freely transfer their QTUM tokens after Block 93335.  Please store your QTUM in wallets (such as QBao or Qtum Core Wallet), QTUM stored on exchanges will NOT receive the airdrop.  Using this snapshot, the Bodhi team will perform the airdrop of Bodhi tokens on the February 16th, 2018 on Chinese New Year.  Timing: *Recommended Deposit Block by Block 93330 *Snapshot Taken on Block 93333 (Estimated sometime between Feb 1 — Feb 5) *Recommend Holding QTUM in wallet through Block 93335  https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/bodhi-airdrop-for-qtum-holders-8d59e6108867

Author: alexvilis
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi Beta alive on Qtum testnet -Developer Update Jan. 26, 2018  Hi Community! We have some exciting news to share with you all. We are glad to announce our first Bodhi Application beta version release on the Qtum Testnet!  Packaged Executables With our alpha test feedback, we noticed there was one big barrier for you all. There was too many steps in order to get the application running!  We are happy to announce that we have packaged the Bodhi Application conveniently into a single executable file for Mac OSX, Windows, and Linux operating systems. We got you covered!  All you will have to do to get it up and running is run the executable file, then your web browser should automatically open up to http://localhost:5555.  Removal of Invalidate One of the important changes to know in the overall flow of our Prediction Market participation is that you can no longer invalidate Oracles. We felt this was an unnecessary extra step in the process to reach the proof of agreement.  In the previous flow, if the Centralized Oracle (or Result Setter) did not set the result before the Betting End Block, there would technically be no result yet and anyone could invalidate the Centralized Oracle and start a new round of Decentralized Oracle voting in which all the results could still be voted on.  Now in the beta flow, if the Centralized Oracle did not set the result before the Betting End Block, anyone can assume the role of the Centralized Oracle and set the result. This would in turn create a new Decentralized oracle (as expected), and participants could vote against the Centralized Oracle’s set result.  Addition of Betting Start and Result Setting Start Blocks Previously, the only block numbers that would be required to be filled out were the Betting End Block and Result Setting End Block. We now have added the Betting Start Block and Result Setting Start Block.  This will give participants greater control in the periods that will be allowed to place bets or set the result.  Invalid Result In addition to user defined results for an event, we have added a default “Invalid” result to every created prediction event. This result signifies the ability to make the entire event invalid as a whole. This result will be treated as another result that can be bet or voted on.  A good use case for this would be say if a sporting event was cancelled due to bad weather. It wouldn’t make sense to reveal a winner when no one won, which is where the Invalid result would come into play.  Leaner Contracts We have stripped out all the unnecessary code from our contracts to make it leaner and thus made the gas transaction fees lower for you all. This should make you and your Qtum wallets happy.  Intuitive UI/UX Redesign We are listening to your feedback and are trying to make the best possible product for you all! We are in process of redesigning our Bodhi Application to make it more intuitive and user friendly.  Keep the comments coming and we will keep on listening and improving!  https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/bodhi-beta-alive-on-qtum-testnet-developer-update-jan-26-2018-d54d32924b9f

Author: Kirilp
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Qweb3 0.6.0 out now!  Qweb3 is a developer tool that is a Javascript wrapper around the Qtum CLI interface. You can use our newest version here: https://github.com/bodhiproject/qweb3.js  New Commands We’ve updated it recently with new commands for all your development needs:  getBlock getBlockchainInfo getBlockHash listContracts getInfo dumpPrivateKey encryptWallet getNewAddress getUnconfirmedBalance importAddress importPrivateKey importPublicKey listLockUnspent sendToAddress setTxFee  These should be all the necessary commands that were missing since the first release. But if you find that you need additional ones, please don’t hesitate to leave an issue on our Github page.  ES6 Syntax We have refactored all our module exporting to use ES6 syntax instead of Babel syntax. We felt like it was unnecessary to use Babel for our tool’s purpose.  More to Come! We hope our tool has been helpful for you fellow developers. One of the upcoming features we plan to include is a full command-line interface to do conversions on the fly. Stay tuned!  https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/qweb3-0-6-0-out-now-47c6c69e63ad

Body: Bodhi Community Update Feb 8, 2018 - The founder of Bodhi, Xiahong Lin, spoke at the Silicon Dragon Valley Salon 2018, the Ant Technology Exploration Conference - Bodhi was listed on South Korean crypto exchange Coinrail - Bodhi won the Cobinhood vote - Announcing a new partnership with SWFT - Upcoming event sponsorship: TokenFest 2018 in San Francisco on March 15 and 16 Learn more: https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/bodhi-community-update-feb-8-2018-9cf4fbb92e5a.

Author: gartmah
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi Prediction Market Developer Update — Feb 13, 2018  From the last beta release, we’ve updated a couple things that we’d like to share with you all. Our next beta release will be including the following changes:  Mac, Windows 64/32, Linux 64/32 versions We have opened up all platforms for usage of our Bodhi App!  Timestamps, Timestamps, everywhere! We’ve changed our contracts to use UNIX timestamps instead of block numbers. We felt this would give greater accuracy in terms of setting events that would take place at a future time.  With ever-changing average block times, it made sense to rely on an actual date and time instead of trying to predict when a future block would take place. Instead of entering a future block, our Bodhi App will be providing a date/time picker for the purposes of selecting start and end times when creating a Prediction Event.  This will provide an overall variance in the block prediction by a maximum of one block.  Bodhi App UI Changes We have separated the Finalize and Withdraw stages of a Prediction Event. We felt like it was confusing for users to combine these two stages together.  UI Revamp Incoming! Please stay tuned for more updates. We have some exciting changes that will follow soon. Some things we have in the pipeline are some user experience changes that we feel will provide more intuitive usage of our Bodhi App.  We are also in discussion of the creation of a light client so that you won’t have to have a fully synced Qtum blockchain. This means less waiting and more predicting!  https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/bodhi-prediction-market-developer-update-feb-13-2018-504fdb07adb5

Author: TimC
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: How do you get the BOT tokens? I have QTUM in my wallet and I'm not sure how to get the BOT tokens.

Author: BitMaver
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: If you stored the QTUM in QT Wallet, Qtum mobile app, and Qbao, please refer to this WIKI for instructions on how to check your BOT balance. Read more at https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/bot-airdrop-on-qtum-done-560df3532014.

Author: filsid
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Community Update Feb.27 https://medium.com/@bodhitoken/community-update-feb-27-5dce91457fe0    In the past few weeks, we have been busy testing our beta internally at Bodhi, attending events and conference to meet with potential partners, talked with a few exchanges, and try to let more people know about Bodhi. Bodhi team attended events including Startup Grind, d10e in Silicon Valley, meetups organized by SF Ethereum Developers, among others.  We will launch our beta on mainnet next month (delayed from the origin goal of launching on mainnet by the end of February). We feel it’s better to delay a bit and release a more finished product than rushing an incomplete product to market. A few challenges that we will solve for the release include:  1 We switched to Electron framework for better user-ability of native desktop app; 2We are adding and testing additional functionality that we feel is important to the usability, including transaction history of   accounts; 3 We are still working hard on the redesign of the UI to give the users a better experience.

Author: crevbi
Title: [ANN][BOT] Bodhi - Developing China's Prediction Market for the World
Body: Bodhi x COBINHOOD: Airdrop + contest  Since integrating more blockchains on COBINHOOD Exchange (kicked off with Litecoin and QTUM), we will start to list more non-ERC20 tokens starting with Bodhi, a QRC20 token.  COBINHOOD is proud to announce Bodhi’s listing on the exchange which will then be followed by exciting giveaways co-presented with the Bodhi team. Check out this timeline for all the exciting things happening with Bodhi on COBINHOOD Exchange.  https://medium.com/cobinhood/bodhi-x-cobinhood-airdrops-contests-5ebb04feaaab
